localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Recur comes packed with features, iOS-specific styling to make Recur fit right into your home-screen making subscription tracking simple and fast.
blogPost.body: Recur comes packed with features, iOS-specific styling to make Recur fit right into your home-screen making subscription tracking simple and fast.
blogPost.title: Recur - Keep track of your subscriptions
blogPost.author: Swapnanil Dhol

localize.description: Recur的功能丰富，iOS特有的风格让Recur正好适合你的主屏幕，让订阅跟踪变得简单快捷。
Recur的功能豐富，iOS特有的風格讓Recur正好適合你的主屏幕，讓訂閱跟蹤變得簡單快捷。

previous.excerpt: ⚠️ Not affiliated with Ray.so ⚠️ Ray.so is a beautiful code snippet generator you can use to show off your code, and now you can use it without leaving your code editor! Just highlight the code you want to upload, and run the RayThis command in VSCode! 🚀📷
previous.title: RayThis - Generate pretty code snippets right out of VSCode

localize.description: ⚠️不隶属于Ray.so⚠️Ray.so是一个漂亮的代码片段生成器，你可以用它来展示你的代码，现在你可以不离开你的代码编辑器就能使用它! 只要高亮显示你要上传的代码，然后在VSCode中运行RayThis命令就可以了! 🚀📷
localize.tagline: 从VSCode中直接生成漂亮的代码片段。

localize.description: ⚠️不隸屬於Ray.so⚠️Ray.so是一個漂亮的代碼片段生成器，你可以用它來展示你的代碼，現在你可以不離開你的代碼編輯器就能使用它! 只要高亮顯示你要上傳的代碼，然後在VSCode中運行RayThis命令就可以了! 🚀📷
localize.tagline: 從VSCode中直接生成漂亮的代碼片段。

next.excerpt: Hosting a party? Let your guests choose the music in real-time with Pyro! Connect your Spotify Account, create a party, invite your guests with a link and you're ready to go. Collaborative listening has never been easier.
next.title: Pyro - Spotify music voting for parties

localize.description: 举办派对？让你的客人实时选择音乐与Pyro! 连接您的 Spotify 帐户，创建一个派对，用链接邀请您的客人，然后您就可以开始了。协作聆听从未如此简单。
舉辦派對？讓你的客人實時選擇音樂與Pyro! 連接您的 Spotify 帳戶，創建一個派對，用鏈接邀請您的客人，然後您就可以開始了。協作聆聽從未如此簡單。
